snippet: Beset by injuries, Islanders goalie Rick DiPietro has played in only 47 games in the past four years, winning 14.
abstract: New York Islanders goalie Rick DiPietro, beset by injuries, has played in only 47 games in the past four years, winning 14.
lead_paragraph: Beset by injuries, Islanders goalie Rick DiPietro has played in only 47 games in the past four years, winning 14.

headline.seo: Oft-Injured Rick DiPietro Vows to Play On
headline.main: DiPietro, an Invisible Islander, Determined to Play On
headline.print_headline: DiPietro, an Invisible Islander, Is Determined to Play Again
